Accuracy.description: The correctness of the final answer provided by the agents.

Coherence.description: The logical and grammatical sense of the sentences formed by the agents.

Efficiency.description: The number of steps and the amount of time taken to solve the puzzle relative to the optimal path.

Reasoning Traceability.description: The ability to follow the thought process of the agents through the steps they take.

Resourcefulness.description: The use of agents' own skills and expertise to solve the problem without external help.

Completeness.description: Whether the solution provided by the agents addresses all aspects of the task including all instructions and constraints.
